sentences.en: Assignment desk editors are logistics experts.
sentences.cn: 调遣部的编辑是一些后勤专家.

sentences.en: Electronic commerce in now ages, world logistics industry contain new development trend.
sentences.cn: 在当今的电子商务时代, 全球物流产业有了新的发展趋势.

sentences.en: He added that the biggest barriers are duties, about, and logistics.
sentences.cn: 他还说, 约300%的关税及物流问题是最大的障碍.

sentences.en: In charge of logistics service suppliers'sourcing, negotiation and managements.
sentences.cn: 负责物流运输供应商的谈判与管理.

sentences.en: Logistics competency directly depends on a firm's strategic positioning.
sentences.cn: 物流能力是有一家公司的战略定位直接决定的.

sentences.en: Logistics is now more important in our industry than technology.
sentences.cn: 物流目前在我们这一行比技术还重要。

sentences.en: Logistics is the entity flow process of the commodity from provide place to the accepted place.
sentences.cn: 物流(Logistics)是指物品从供应地向接受地的实体流动过程.

sentences.en: Logistics requirements for the accuracy, timeliness, reflect business - to - cash flow control.
sentences.cn: 物流的准确 、 及时性要求反映的是企业对资金流的控制.

sentences.en: Logistics service is a balance of service priority and cost.
sentences.cn: 物流服务是服务优先与成本间的平衡.

sentences.en: Many individuals begin their careers in logistics as analysts.
sentences.cn: 许多人以物流行业中分析员作为其职业生涯的开始.

sentences.en: Review and communicate customers specifications to Logistics, Operations and Quality department.
sentences.cn: 把客户的详细需求传达给物流, 生产部和质检部.

sentences.en: the day-to-day logistics involved with mining
sentences.cn: 采矿所涉及的日常后勤工作

sentences.en: The industry of drug distribution combines logistics and drug manufacture.
sentences.cn: 药品分销行业是物流和医药相结合的产物.

sentences.en: The orchardist gave little thought to the logistics of harvesting the crop.
sentences.cn: 种子园经营者很少考虑到收集种子的勤务工作.

sentences.en: The skills and logistics of getting such a big show on the road pose enormous practical problems.
sentences.cn: 搞如此大型的巡演，无论是技术上还是物流上都面临着巨大的实际问题。

sentences.en: This shows that modern war a large extent, the logistics support capacity.
sentences.cn: 由此可见,现代战争在很大程度上是后勤保障能力的较量.

words.tran_cn: 后勤学的；[数] 符号逻辑的
物流师；军需官；后勤人员

phrases.tran_cn: 符号逻辑体系；货物流程系统

trans.tran_en: If you refer to the logistics of doing something complicated that involves a lot of people or equipment, you are referring to the skilful organization of it so that it can be done successfully and efficiently
